text:
A Mysterious Invitation

A dimly lit room, Lizaveta looks curious.  
Raskolnikov watches, tension fills the air.  
Lizaveta: “Why did they invite me?”  
Raskolnikov: “Something feels off about this.”  

---  

A cluttered tavern, Raskolnikov deep in thought.  
His mind races with unsettling ideas.  
Raskolnikov: “What if this leads to a choice?”  
Raskolnikov: “I can’t shake this feeling...”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov learns about Lizaveta's work with a family in poverty, revealing his growing superstitions and connections to the pawnbroker Alyona Ivanovna.
